113.content:
THUMP!

The trees throughout the forest seemed to quiver in fear at the sound.

THUMP!

Again, they shuttered. For all they could do was watch in horror and pray that "She" would come soon to protect them.

THUMP! SNAP!

The trees gazed at the source of their fellow plant's torture. It was small in comparison to them, but large when seen with others of it's species.

THUMP! CRACK!

The creature grunted and a determined grin stretched across it's face, much to the surprise and horror of the trees. Then, the creature coiled it's back legs upward once again and thrusted them with great power at their fellow tree's trunk.

THWAP

A small, orange disk slipped from the branches of the tree and the creature's expression brightened with satisfaction. Then, a tiny voice called from the other side of the forest.

"Do ya got it big brother?" the voice called. It sounded quite young and had a silly accent the trees couldn't pinpoint.

"Eeeeyup," the larger creature said, it's voice as deep as the other's was high. The creature bite the orange disk and raised it's head up. Then, with a flick of it's neck, the disk was sent soaring over the trees.

A moment passed and the creature stood still. Then, it heard the tiny voice chim "thanks Big Mac!" and it smiled.

"Eeeyup" said the creature, mostly to itself it seemed, as it turned to exit the everfree. It was then he found himself face to face with a.....

1132.content:
...Beautiful brown mare. Her mane looked soft like moss and her eyes were like gateways into the deepest forest. Big Macintosh's eyes widened and he took a step back.

The mare stepped closer to him and glared. Big Mac gulped and said "h-howdy?"

Her only response was silence and the continuation of her glare. The stallion's ears drooped a little and she clenched her teeth. "You stupid idiot!" she cried. "You think you can come in here and hurt my friends, do you?"

"Uhhhh-"

"Silence!" she yelled, making Mac shrink back. She smirked a bit and stomped her hoof. "This will not be going unpunished my friend."

Big Mac's pupils shrunk and he backed up more. Even if the mare was smaller than him, he still felt oddly intimidated by her. Like her entire being radiated with power. He swallowed and said quietly "ah'm sorry."

"Well sorry doesn't do anything, does it?!?"

The stallion reminded quiet.

The mare then went back to thinking....."ohhhhh," a grin twisted onto her face and she laughed. "I know just what to do with you!"

Her hoof stomped the ground and suddenly Big Mac was yanked onto his back by vines. They shot up from the ground holding his neck and all four legs down. He panicked and struggled against them, but stopped when the mare stood above him. She smirked and put her hoof on his abdomen, rubbing it gently.

Big Mac shivered at her touch, and she laughed. "You work out, huh?" Big Mac didn't response. He could only remain quiet and listen to his heart pounding in his chest.

Big Mac laid there for the next five minutes, completely in shock.

"Um......That just happened, ah guess." He sighed before getting up and going back to the farm.

Everything seemed fine after that, but is it really fine?

11322211.content:
The mare and filly galloped toward their older brother quickly at the sight of him. Big Mac smiled with relief and began to walk toward them, but stopped when a rather hard kick to his belly button shook his gut. The stallion winced and fell back on his haunches, placing a tender hoof on his swollen tummy.

“Landsakes Big Macintosh!” exclaimed Applejack as she neared, seemingly oblivious to her big brother’s situation. “Where in tarnation have ya been?!?”

Before Big Mac could speak his littlest sister chimed in “we were lookin’ all over for you!” Even in the dim light cast by the setting sun, Big Mac could see the puffiness of Applebloom’s eyes and wet trails running down her round cheeks. “Ah...ah thought a timber wolf got you,” said the filly, and she began to weep into her sister’s shoulder.

Big Mac’s heart stung and he tried moving to hug his sister, but he'd been reminded of his newly gained gut in the process. So instead, he simply dropped his ears a bit and looked at Applejack.

The older mare sighed. “Well, he's here now so no need ta freight no more,” she said and gave her little sister a gentle smile. “But,” she began as her attention was turned back to Big Mac “we do want to know where the hay you were the past few hours.”

Big Macintosh gulped and began to sweat. The darkness casted by the trees helped to shield his sisters from seeing his bulbous belly, but that wouldn't last. He'd have to tell them the truth sooner or later.

With a sigh, Big Macintosh spoke quietly. “Well, ah went ta get Bloom’s frisbee from the forest. Ah found it in a tree, so ah just bucked it outta the branches ta get it down-”

“And that took ya all day ta do?” Applejack said, eyebrow raised.

“Nnope,” continued Big Mac. “Ya see, ah um...ah angered a wood nymph. She was upset ah kicked her tree…”

Applejack frowned “then what happened?”

“Well…” Big Mac bit his lip and sweat more profusely. “S-she uh...she….” with a sigh, Big Mac stood and walked closer to them. He then, blushing brightly in the process, turned his side to them and let them see his belly.

The two sisters gasped in unison, and Big Mac closed his eyes, not wanting to see their horrified expressions. Applebloom screamed when she watched his massive belly tremble with movement, and Big Mac’s body tensed.

Applejack, eyes locked onto his stomach, mumbled quietly “what the hay happened…?”

Big Mac, still not facing them, said in a slightly shaky voice “s-she impregnated meh with three foals.” Apple bloom gasped, and Big Mac swallowed hard before continuing. “And she told meh that ah'll be like this for another nine months before they're born.”

Applejack and the gang burst into Big Macintosh's room where they had left him.

"Mnmhh... Wibbly wobbly... Timey wimey..." Mac rolled around on the bed, a troubled expression on his face as he muttered in his sleep.

Applejack laughed nervously. "Phew, looks like Zecora's spell was a dud!"

"Don't speak too soon, AJ..." Pinkie warned. The group moved their eyes towards the bed.

They saw his head against the pillow, the blankets up to his neck, and as their eyes trailed down, a growing bugle beneath the covers. His belly was visibly inflating with child as he rolled onto his back. With a quiet noise, his belly button popped, the little bump outlined by the covers.

"Mac!" They all shouted in unison.

His eyes shot open, and, wrapped in blankets, he tumbled to the floor. "Huh? What?"

He felt a strange sensation in his stomach, and, managing to untangle the sheets around him, gaped at the sight before him as he scrambled to his feet.

His belly grew beneath him, surpassing seven, eight, and nine months as it grew to monstrous size, before finally stopping just a few inches off the floor. Mac's back arched as he struggled to hold up the increased weight in his abdomen.

Panting, Mac looked at his belly, then the mares, then back to his belly, then the mares again, before uttering a most elucidating "Er..."

Zecora pushed through the ponies blocking the doorway before speaking.
"Macintosh, your gravid size
When you touched the Doctor, did arise
Because the magic, in his eyes
Makes colts grow, and multiplies
The size of their girth.
This sort of affliction can only be cured by birth."

The red earth pony's eyes widened as he patted his belly with a tentative hoof. "So Ah'm pregnant, an' that Doctor Whooves fella in th' barn is the daddy?"

Zecora put a hoof on his shoulder.
"More or less, my rotund amigo
You carry his spawn, as you know and we know.
Nine months or more, I cannot be certain,
All I know is, you'll need a new curtain."

The group turned to the window above the bed; Mac had, indeed, torn down the curtain.

"So... How big will Ah get?" He asked, looking to Zecora with nervous eyes, who shrugged in response.

"As big as Doctor Whooves, perhaps more.
Soon you will need help getting through the door."

The room's occupants sat digesting the information. Zecora, sad about the unfortunate mess she had caused, Applejack, horrified at the thought of dozens, if not hundreds of little nieces and nephews running around, and Mac, feeling rather conflicted about the whole thing, who simply sat playing with his new belly.

Twilight broke the silence. "I know a spell that can fix it!"
All heads turned towards her.
"It'll transfer Mac's babies back into the Doctor's womb!"

"Well?" Applejack leapt towards Twilight, a glint of hope in her eyes, "What is it?"

"Well, it was first created around four hundred years ago, to keep unborn foals safe in case the mother had an accident or was otherwise unable to carry the babies to term. It's very interesting, you see, the principles upon which it works are very precise, and even the slightest miscalculation could-"

Fluttershy interjected. "Will the babies be alright?"

"Yes, they'll be moved back into Doctor Whooves' womb, and even if that fails, there's a backup enchantment that causes the children to be transferred to other ponies of the same gend-"

"Yeah, yeah, we get it, egghead stuff! Now are y'all gon' fix mah brother or not?!"

Zecora touched Applejack's hoof.
"Calm down my friend
This is his choice, not yours
Should we not allow him some time behind closed doors?"

"You're right, Zecora," Applejack said, "Mac, we're gonna give y'all some time ta make this decision yerself, alright?"

Mac looked up, answered with his usual 'eeyup', and went back to rubbing his momentous belly. At the moment, he seemed to be trying to touch his belly button. His belly, several feet around, made this a difficult task. Difficult, but not impossible, as Mac finally succeeded at touching the soft lump, before recoiling at the sudden sensation through his sensitive skin. The seven mares left Mac alone with his thoughts to decide.

"What now?"
"Now, Pinkie," Twilight said, "We wait."

And so they did. Down in the living room, the group sat around in silence for twenty minutes, before jumping at the sound of heavy hoofsteps going down the stairs. In the doorway stood Big Macintosh, panting from the effort of dragging around his enormous midsection.

"Ah've made up mah mind..." He panted, sweat dripping down his face. Rainbow Dash and Applejack rushed to his side, helping him move onto the couch, where he lied down on his side. He sat catching his breath as the occasional kick rocked his belly. After a few minutes of rest, he lifted his head up. "Miss Twilight, Ah've decided..."

1511122221112.content:
The Doctor anxiously watched the lavender unicorn in her intense bout of concentration, wondering if he had gotten more than he bargained for with this whole pregnancy business. I doubt any other could probably say they had to give birth to multiple foals... he thought to himself with a slight chuckle, of course...they probably never experienced milking their own teats either...not that males usually grow any for that matter... He snapped back to reality as he heard the hum of Twilight's horn start to fade and the light it emitted began to wane as her spell came to a close.

"Well Doctor..." The lavender unicorn started off hesitantly, "I've got good news and some somewhat startling news..."

"Huh? W-what do you m-mean?" Doctor Whooves looked at her with curiosity, wondering just what sort of startling news she could possibly have. Was something wrong with his children? His babies? As his thoughts began to spiral out of control, coming up with stranger and stranger scenarios, he found himself fighting back tears as he realized he felt scared for the foals growing inside him. As strange as this pregnancy would be under normal circumstances, he was still their mother, and he didn't want anything bad to happen to them.

"Doctor Whooves snap out of it!" Twilight's voice brought him out of his terror-induced trance and back to reality.

"S-sorry Twilight." The Doctor wiped the tears that had been forming in his eyes. "W-when you said startling news I kind of got a bit worried about the foals..." he explained as he rubbed what he could of his beach ball sized baby factory. He had been hoping that the hormonal roller coaster of pregnancy would have spared him, but then again it had made him produce milk (and a lot of it) already, so he probably should have figured that the mood swings and overreactions would have come as well.

Much to his relief Twilight smiled and waved off his worries in a gesture of understanding. "It's alright Doctor I understand your concern, and don't worry, nothing bad is going to happen to any of your foals. They're all healthy and accounted for!" These words eased the Doctor's mind greatly, and he gave a sigh of relief, but continued to caress his belly in an attempt to settle down his brood, who were still very much active and were still kicking his insides at a somewhat frequent pace.

"Just a few more questions though Twilight?" The Doctor asked as he put a hoof on his chin to think.

"Yes Doctor?"

"Just how many am I having?"

"Oh! That was a part of the good news! You're having all eight of the foals you requested!" The mare explained with a smile. The Doctor gave a relieved sigh at hearing the news that all of his children had made it into him, and gave his belly a loving pat.

Oh my little ones...Soon I'll be able to cradle you all in my hooves.. He thought with tears threatening to spill out of his eyes. However, this time the tears were of joy rather than fear. However, he fought them back as he still had something else to ask.

"Twilight?"

"Yes Doctor?"

"Um...just what exactly was the startling news you mentioned?" Upon hearing the question Twilight's demeanor changed from happy and reassuring to nervous and hesitant.

"Well...you see Doctor...There was a bit of a mishap with the spell..."

"W-what? What do you mean mishap???"

"Well Doctor you see when I scanned you I found that all the babies were indeed healthy, but..."

"But?"

"But you see...well I don't know quite how, but it seems that they're gestating at a much faster rate than the average pregnancy."

"H-how much faster are we talking about?"

"Well..." Twilight paused and took a deep breath as she prepared to give him the news he was anxiously awaiting, "it seems that during the night the babies grew through the first trimester, and are now in the middle of the second trimester." She explained with a nervous grin, before adding, "this would explain why you're so large after so little time. Though I'm surprised to see that your body is making the changes to adjust to the pregnancy almost perfectly..." She told him before taking a step back.

And what a drastic adjustment it was! She thought as she whistled inwardly in amazement. Indeed, the recent changes that the Doctor's body had undergone, disregarding his enormous belly, were astounding. Leaking teats that were bigger and more swollen than mares that had gone through their fourth pregnancies, an enormous pair of flanks that were so filled with fat that even the slightest disturbance made them jiggle in response, and the most prominent set of foalbearing hips that put even Applejack's natural curves to shame. Why, if Twilight hadn't been the one to cast the spell on him and didn't know that prior to this that he was a stallion, she would have mistaken him for the most heavily pregnant mare that she had ever seen! Twilight figured that the changes were so much more noticeable now was because of the fact that the Doctor was carrying so many.

"Uh Twilight? Is that all the news you had to tell me?" The sound of the Doctor's worried voice brought Twilight's examination to a screeching halt as she realized that she'd been borderline ogling his gravid form.

"U-uh no sorry." She stuttered in embarrassment at almost getting caught studying him, and realized she still needed to tell him the most important piece of news. "Anyways," she shook her head to get herself back on track, "since you're growing so fast, I estimated that at the rate you're growing, that you'll be at full term sometime tomorrow morning, and will probably give birth to the foals sometime that afternoon..."

"Hrm...that is...definitely alarming..." The Doctor mused to himself. He hadn't expected to give birth to his foals this soon. His belly certainly had grown at an unfathomable rate, and as he kept watch on his enormous orb of life, he could almost swear that with each rise and fall of the crest of his mound, he saw it growing just a little bit more. After a bit of thinking though, he shrugged and figured that since he was pretty much immobile for the time being, giving birth was probably best done sooner rather than later! Suddenly though, two urges of fulfillment hit him at the exact same time, each of them fighting for dominance in his mind in order to receive attention.

On one hand his belly gave an almost dragon-like roar, and his growing brood began to kick him more frequently as they voiced their agreement with his stomach. He groaned at the feelings of all their simultaneous kicks, and began to rub his belly furiously in a desperate attempt to calm them down. However, he knew what they were all wanting. He hadn't eaten since yesterday evening, before he had gotten anywhere near this big. In short, he needed to eat, and fast.

On the other hand, during the time that he had been talking to Twilight it seems that his rapid pregnancy hadn't cut his teats any sort of a break, as just before Twilight had arrived he had managed to relieve them of most of the milk that they had accumulated. Now though? As he felt them begin to weigh down heavily once again with nourishing breast-milk for his eight little timelords, he took a peek around his gigantic, quivering, pregnant belly and almost felt his jaw drop at the fact that the two milk-makers had actually gotten even bigger, now no longer the size of honeydews, but rather ripe watermelons fresh from the fields.

He bit his lip in frustration at the dilemma. He couldn't satisfy both things at once since he was practically confined to his bed, his belly and teats pretty much rendering him immobile. So the only solution was to ask Twilight, and he needed to make a decision of what he needed help with fast!

"U-uh...T-Twilight?" He stuttered nervously as he got the attention of the lavender unicorn mare.

"Yes Doctor?" She inquired with a confused tilt of her head. "Is there anything you need?"

This was it! Whatever need he wanted to have satisfied he needed to say it now! Bracing himself and deciding upon what he'd ask for he took a deep breath. "Twilight-"

Twilight bit her lip, she knew it would be tough to keep the situation a secret, especially if she was going to order lots of things from Sugarcube Corner given Pinkie's talkative and inquisitive nature... What is going on with my voice? he thought, brooding over what might be the cause of this voice problem, my voice hasn't cracked since I was a filly... he made a confused face at this. Wait filly? Why'd I think that? Just because I'm pregnant doesn't mean I'm no longer a stallion...

"Doctor Whooves? Is everything alright?" Twilight furrowed her brows in concern. The Doctor was behaving strangely...well, strangely for what was going on anyways, and it worried her a bit. She further confirmed that something was amiss by the look of concern on the Doctor's face, despite him gesturing to go off on her way with a dismissing wave. However, she knew right now that her first priority for now was to get some food for him and his eight foals, so she shook it off, though still couldn't shake her curiosity as she left the TARDIS.

Now...what to do... the Doctor mused, figuring that he had some time to himself now that Twilight was busy getting him some food. After a moment of thinking, he decided...

1511122221112212.content:
It was at this moment that the Doctor realized that the eight foals in his belly had been quite active given recent events, and were kicking up a storm in his gravid gut. Incidentally, one of them seemed to be hitting his bladder, which made him remember that it hadn't been since yesterday that he'd gone to the bathroom, and now he really had to go it seems.

"Well, looks like I'm going to have to take a trip to the little fill- colt's room!" He corrected himself hastily. Shaking off his slip of the tongue once again he looked over at the door to the bathroom, which lay only a few feet across the room. Normally this trip wouldn't have posed any sort of challenge to the the good Doctor, but in his current condition? Can I even get up? He wondered before a look of determination crossed his face. Of course I can! I am Time Turner! Timelord of Ponyville, and I will not let a little thing like my pregnancy hinder my quest to go to the bathroom! He shouted mentally, boosting his spirits and giving him the will to complete this quest.

Bracing himself for the arduous journey, he hummed in concentration before giving himself a few experimental twists and turns to see if he could even make it off the bed. It seemed that luck was in his favor as he seemed to actually be able to use his new added weight to boost his momentum in order to roll himself over his own beach ball sized belly.

"Alright...here we go..." He whispered to himself, not stopping to think about how his voice had once again switched to the weirdly high pitched tone from earlier. He steeled himself as he rolled once, twice, three times in quick succession until finally he felt himself rolling over his own belly. "Ha! Take that physics!" He crowed triumphantly as he basked in his accomplishment, that is until he realized that he was about to fall off the bed. "No no wait!" He squeaked, desperately trying to find his footing before he toppled to the ground.

THUD! He sighed in relief as all four of his hooves met the floor of the TARDIS, though the impact would have announced that to anypony in the area as his added weight made him feel the shock of the landing as his swollen crotch-moobs quavered and his more than ample plot jiggled in response. His children seemed to notice this as they begun to kick and buck inside his belly. After stopping for a little breather, and a quick belly pat to quiet down his energetic litter, the Doctor begun to make his way towards his destination.

It was after the first couple of steps that he realized something.

"Walking is harrrrrrrrd!" He groaned tiredly, trying to push himself through the burning in his hooves that came from supporting his new size. It was true, in his new state, the Doctor felt that everything about him was just so...big and heavy. His belly was big enough that it had started growing out to the sides as well as underneath him, and he felt it the crest of it dragging along the ground with each hoofstep. However, his belly wasn't the only thing dragging along the ground it seemed. He had to bite his lip to keep himself from moaning as he felt his massive crotch moobs sway with each step, each nipple on the becoming rigid as they dragged across the floor, and he was certain that he was probably going to leave a couple trails of milk on his way to and from the bathroom. Added to this fact was his plot quaking with each step so much that he felt like his flanks were filled with nothing but jelly as it quivered and wobbled to and fro.

Given all of this it was easy to see that the Doctor had quite the task set before him. Lucky for him the onset of his impending motherhood had given him an almost unbreakable sense of will, and after what seemed like a marathon, he'd done it! He was tired, he was hungry, and sort of irritated, but he'd done it!

He'd made it to the restroom!

"Ha!" He cried out, panting from exhaustion and sweating a river, "A -hoo boy- a little added weight won't slow this mare down! I mean stallion! Stallion!" He reprimanded angrily. Why do I keep saying that? Another feeling of fullness in his bladder reminded him of what he came for, and after a couple twenty tries he finally managed to relieve himself of that burden and washed his hooves before noticing that he'd left a couple of buckets lying around that were usually reserved for when he cleaned the bathroom floors.

Suddenly, he recalled that his teats were awfully sore...and they were leaking pretty badly...

"Best to take care of it...at least to gain some relief, if only for a little while..." He assured himself as he went over and picked up both of the buckets in his teeth. After a second of contemplating where to do the deed he decided that the bed would be the most convenient place for it and made his way back. After tiredly making his way back, he hoisted himself onto the bed with a grunt, and placed the two large buckets beneath him.

After taking careful consideration to balance himself on the edge of his bed he lined the buckets up with his teats, which were currently hanging over the edge. "Alright..." he breathed, "time to get this out of my system!"

It didn't take much coaxing with his hooves to instigate the flow of milk that had built up, and the Doctor found himself surprised as he heard the steady pitter patter of milk hitting the bottom of both buckets. As he kneaded and worked his hooves on them, he reminded himself that this was strictly because the feeling of his overfilled teats had been annoying and nothing else. However, he couldn't deny that milking himself like this felt...good in a way.

"Mmm~...that's the stuff~" he murmured to himself, voice settling into a high pitch once again. "Hehe...You lot have turned your mommy into a big fat dairy cow haven't you all?" He giggled, giving his belly a loving pat. So engaged was he with his activity that he hadn't noticed that his voice hadn't returned to its normal tone, and had stayed to its new, higher pitch. If the Doctor cared though, he didn't show any evidence as he closed his eyes in contentment, getting a steady rhythm going as he happily hummed a tune to himself.

After a few minutes, the Doctor no longer heard the sound of milk hitting the bucket, and was left feeling slightly disappointed at the fact that his fun time was over; however he was grateful for the fact that though his swollen mammaries hadn't seemed to shrink any, the discomforting feeling of him being overfilled had finally disappeared. He nodded to himself in satisfaction before laying back down in the position he was in before all of this started, or he would have, if a few whiffs of air hadn't passed through his nostrils.

"Mmm...what is that delightful smell?" He inquired curiously. It smelled so sweet and fulfilling that even if he wasn't as hungry as he was he would probably have downed it in one go! He took a few sniffs around, craning his head and closing his eyes in concentration to see if he could pinpoint the location of the hunger-inducing scent. Finally, his nose settled on a location and he opened his eyes to find...the buckets of milk...

Welllll...I did go through the trouble of making it... He thought to himself, licking his lips hungrily as he eyed the two buckets, filled to the brim, and since you eight aren't out here to enjoy it... a mischievous grin crossed his face as he carefully picked up one with his hooves and brought it to his mouth. He tentatively took a sip before his eyes widened in shock at the taste.

By Celestia's sun... He was in awe at the taste of the milk he'd produced. It was so rich, so creamy, and sweet to boot! He wasted no time in guzzling down the entire bucket-full before he hurriedly started on the second one, chugging it down as if his life depended on it as he felt the heavenly liquid make it's way down his throat and into his stomach.

"So delicious~" he sighed happily as he sat back, a goofy grin settled on his face as a result of the journey his taste-buds had been sent on. His children seemed satisfied for the moment since they'd stopped kicking quite so frequently, and he lay on his back once again, feeling his stomach gurgle and slosh with the large amount of milk he'd drank. "Heh...well if I ever needed bits I could probably just sell any milk that I made! I could probably even give Sweet Apple Acres a run for there money!" he joked as he licked the remaining milk off of his muzzle, "of course, that'd mean that your mommy would have to put even more of you in her tummy!" he cooed lovingly as he gave his belly a loving rub.

At this point his mind was well enough out of his milking-induced trance that he'd noticed that he'd reverted to referring to himself as a "she" once again, and that his voice seemed to have permanently risen to its new pitch that fit either a very feminine stallion, or a very stallionish mare. For some reason though, the Doctor found that though he'd worried about these factors before, that now it didn't really bother him all that much anymore. One thing that did worry him though, was that his stomach had let out a titanic growl out, reminding him that milk alone wasn't going to cut it for rectifying his hunger.

"I sure hope Twilight gets back with my food soon..." he whined.

His ears suddenly perked up at hearing the sound of the door to his room opening and closing.

"Doctor Whooves?" came the familiar voice of Twilight Sparkle, "I'm back with the food you requeste- where'd those buckets on the floor come from?"

The doctor smiled in relief as he could finally satiate his hunger. Twisting himself to look around his enormously pregnant belly, he saw that...

He saw that it was indeed Twilight Sparkle who had entered the TARDIS once again.

"Oh thank goodness you're back Twilight! I was just thinking about how hungry I was! He squealed giddily, catching Twilight off guard, since she'd only heard his new voice for the second it'd cracked before she'd left.

I knew something was up... her mind cried out in victory that little voice crack earlier wasn't just a fluke! However, her extended knowledge of friendship knew that something like this could potentially be making a mountain out of a molehill, and should be handled as delicately as possible in order to not make the Doctor not freak out.

"What's up with your voice!" Twilight blurted out, before immediately sticking a hoof in her mouth as an embarrassed blush lit up her muzzle. Well nice job being tactful Twilight...

"Oh it's nothing I'm sure!" the Doctor hastily waved off the question before gaining a hardened look, "now less talking, more eating please!" he demanded, gesturing for her to bring the plates of food over.

"O-oh u-uh right!" Twilight stuttered as she lay the trays of pastries and sweets on the bed within the Doctor's reach.

"Oh-ho yeah!" The Doctor's mouth was already watering at the veritable field of all things cavity inducing as trays of cupcakes, cookies, fritters, and pies lay around him. Well, bottom's up! he cried in his mind, for he'd already stuffed his face greedily into a nearby apple pie. It wasn't even a minute before he'd devoured the entire thing and went for the closest tray of cupcakes.

"U-um...so yeaaaah..." Was all Twilight could muster as she watched in awe as the Doctor absolutely destroyed the feast that would have normally fed about 30 of your average ponies, but only about 10 of Applejack's family members, because those ponies could eat! However, next to the Doctor as he was right now, the Apple family looked as if they barely ate anything compared to the pregnant stallion's rampage.

After about fifteen straight minutes of hearing nothing but food meeting its end at the voracious maw of Doctor Whooves, Twilight's jaw managed to pick itself up off of the floor as she heard his feast come to a close with one little signal.

"BRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAP! An earth-shattering belch was emitted from the Doctor's mouth as Twilight nearly felt herself pushed back from the force of it.

Well that was...an experience... Twilight blinked, not quite sure what to think of the whole thing.



"Twilight?" The unicorn was snapped out of her thoughts as she heard the Doctor address her.

"Yes Doctor Whooves?"

"I-I just...thank you...for everything." the lavender mare saw that a warm smile had settled upon the Doctor's face, and as she saw the genuine gratitude in his eyes, she felt a smile of her own begin to form on her face.

"It's no problem Doctor, it's what friends are for!" she said modestly, her smile growing wider.

"Well Twilight Sparkle you are certainly one of the best friends a mare could ever hope to hav-" The Doctor was cut off as a huge yawn overtook him. "Heh...I guess all of that eating can really tire a lady out you know?" He chuckled wistfully, before yawning again. "Guess I'll hit the hay then! Good night Twilight!" He muttered, before a sudden snore told Twilight that he'd indeed fallen asleep, cradling his belly protectively as it rose and fell with each of his breaths.

"Uh...don't you mean stallion?" Twilight's smile had disappeared by now, and she was stuck wondering if the Doctor knew what pro-nouns went with which gender. Oh well, it is getting pretty late actually, she looked at the clock, seeing that it was three-quarters past nine o' clock. Fortunately, she had already told Spike that she'd be spending the night at one of her friends's places for something important, and to watch over the library the next day in order to make sure that the Doctor's fast-paced pregnancy went smoothly. The young drake had been curious, but trusted Twilight and was actually quite happy since he'd probably shirk his work for that day and just laze around the library or go to Rarity's.

Twilight yawned as she realized that with all that had happened through the day, she'd worn herself out, since carrying all that food from one place to the next without anypony noticing had been taxing, even for a unicorn as powerful as her. After rolling out and settling into a sleeping bag she'd packed for herself, and also secretly cuddling with the Smarty Pants doll that she'd gotten back from Big Macintosh while at the Apple's house, she felt herself drifting off to sleep...

151112222111221211.content:
COCK-A-DOODLE-DOO Doctor Whooves groaned frustratedly and pulled his pillow over his face in a fruitless attempt to block out the fact that by the the rooster's schedule on Sweet Apple Acres, it was time for everyone to start their days.

Someone as pregnant as I am shouldn't be woken up this early... He grumbled inwardly. Giving a sigh of defeat, he tossed his pillow aside in order to face what the day had brought him.

He wasn't prepared for the sight that met him.

The first thing that he noticed was of course, none other than his belly, and if he'd thought it was huge yesterday well let's just say he wouldn't be getting up and walking around to say the least.

"How in the hay- WHAT IN THE NAME OF CELESTIA!"

"AH!" Twilight jumped in shock as she heard the Doctor scream in a voice that was not his own. "DOCTOR WHOOVES WHAT IN THE NAME OF-" She stopped dead in her tracks as she stared at her friend's immensely gravid form. "What..."

"Twilight my voice!" the Doctor cried out, desperately looking to her for an answer, "what's wrong with my voice???" Twilight had no answer, his voice had changed once again during the night, and was no longer stuck in the ambiguous zone it had been. It was now distinctly feminine sounding, and was both softer and sweeter as a result as opposed to his deeper and gruffer voice that he'd had two days ago. Unfortunately for Doctor Whooves, his voice wasn't the only thing that had changed.

"Uh..."

"Twilight! Help!"

"You uh..." Twilight struggled to find her words, and instead pulled a mirror from the nightstand to show him, "just take a look..."

The Doctor, while scared out of his mind, was actually quite curious underneath all the fear and nervousness that was dominating his emotions currently. Raising an eyebrow at the purple mare, he took the mirror in his hooves and gasped.

"W-What..." the Doctor felt his heart stop as he saw his face in the mirror, or to be more accurate, what was formerly his face. What was once the face of a well groomed, blocky, and charming stallion, there was now something more sleek, softer, and rounder, giving him a more gentle appearance. His mane had also seemed to grow out quite a bit as locks of his mane were now hanging over his face. All of these new changes had given him the appearance of... "a mare..." he breathed, "I'm a mare now..."

"Yup!" Twilight called out from behind the wall that was his belly, "you're definitely one-hundred percent mare!"

"T-Twilight!" the Doctor yelped as his face was lit up a crimson hue in embarrassment.

"Hehe, just trying to make light of the situation, sorry about that!" she grinned sheepishly as she peeked out from around the Doctor's growing belly.

"It's all right Twilight..." the Doctor sighed sadly, "I just wish I knew how this happened is all," he, or rather she rubbed her forehead in deep thought, trying to figure out why he'd gone from stallion to mare in one night.

"Hm..." Twilight ground her teeth together, "I'm not exactly sure what could have...WAIT!" she shouted out in realization, causing Doctor Whooves to flinch back in surprise. She turned happily to the Doctor to explain "the spell!"

"W-what?"

"The spell!" She repeated, "the spell must have an underlying layer of magic that makes sure that the pony that becomes pregnant is actually able to give birth!"

"Meaning?"

"Meaning that all of changes like your voice, facial layout, your teats, and your uh...lack of male equipment," she listed, before turning a light red at the last item, "means that the magic turned you into a mare because otherwise-"

"I wouldn't have been able to actually give birth to my foals." the Doctor finished quietly, her nerves much calmer now that she actually understood what was going on. A tranquil silence fell over the two mares, one of them with her hooves on her swollen abdomen, the other watching with a face full of curiosity and wonder, secretly thinking about what it felt like having foals living inside of you.

The silence was finally broken by a loud rumble coming from Doctor Whooves's belly, causing her to giggle shyly and blush a light red. "Hehe, it seems that it's time for me to eat..."

"I suppose so," Twilight replied while joining in the giggle, "so I suppose you'd like the same thing as yesterday then?"

"Works for me! I could eat just about anything right now!"

"That settles it then, I'll pick up the same thing as yesterday and be back around noon time with Nurse Redheart and Nurse Tenderheart...and also Pinkie." Twilight declared as she began to leave.

"Wait Twilight!" the Doctor called out, causing the purple mare to turn around with a confused expression.

"What is it Doctor?"

"Well, I get why you're bringing the two nurses..." Doctor Whooves tilted her head curiously, "but why Pinkie?" at this inquiry Twilight's gave a half lidded stare, which unnerved the Doctor quite a bit.

"Trust me, bearing foals can be very stressful, and for some reason my mind is telling me that having Pinkie there will at least mitigate some of that stress I think."

"Oh...well carry on then?" Twilight nodded curtly before leaving to go finish her errands as quickly as she could, leaving the now female Doctor Whooves alone with her children once again.

Well...I suppose that's that then. she thought with a shrug.

After a while...

For what little there had been left was rage. A boiling seething mixture of hate, bloodlust, and a desire for vengeance.

And so Sombra's very anger began to pull back the pieces of himself that had been scattered. It had taken much time, but the very thought of getting revenge on those who had wronged him kept his mind zeroed in on his task once it had reformed. The method of the revenge however, was something he had deliberated over for many days and nights. A complete destruction of the land would be too obvious, and would likely get him killed, maybe this time for good, so he'd waved off the possibility of a direct attack.

A covert operation of corrupting the politicians was not guaranteed to work, as if he corrupted any noblemen, he knew that those meddlesome princesses of Canterlot and their little Elements of Harmony would come running to put a stop to his plans as well.

Then came the idea he saw could work the best. Corrupting the Crystal Empire's heir. It was foolproof! Nobody would suspect that the children of that little brat and her consort would be corrupted with his own blood, which was filled with dark crystal magic, would be serving under him until it was too late. There had been just one tiny problem.

The princess had been sterile.

Sombra had just about gone into a fit right there, his greatest plan, ruined by the fact that the princess wasn't fit enough to bear a child! He had almost given up.

Then the zebra had given him an even better option.

Sombra flashed a predatory grin on his muzzle as he recalled that he'd already corrupted Shining Armor once. Even though it wasn't visible right now, Sombra could still feel the taint in the pregnant prince's blood.

Sombra almost laughed aloud. This was too perfect! Not only was the prince pregnant with mutiple foals, but he would only be too eager to give himself up for corruption.

After all, one could never truly purge dark magic from themselves after being exposed, which meant that after this one...that purple unicorn would be next...

That is for a later time. He decided with a nod of his head before turning his attention back to the newly formed lovers. His grin widened as he saw that they had long since finished their session, and had fallen fast asleep. Now was his chance!

His horn lit with a faint glow as he and Shining Armor disappeared, leaving a lone Flash Sentry behind, who only muttered unintelligibly before going back to sleep.

Shining was awakened by a light collision with the ground, luckily it was on his side, so his gargantuan foal factory didn't take too much of a hit. The first thing he noticed was that he seemed to be on a hard stone floor, and he was in a cave of some sort.

“W-Wha?” He squeaked in fear, not even noticing that his voice had begun to sound more feminine since he'd last spoke, “w-where am I?”

“Funny you should ask little prince...” Shining swiveled his head around to see where the voice had come from, but could only see darkness all around him, causing him to curl up in fear.

“W-where are you? S-show y-yourself!” The prince had tried to put on a brave face, but his bold declaration had lost all of its power and turned into a mere whisper as if it had come out of Fluttershy's mouth instead.

“Oh but my little pony,” the voice chuckled darkly, “I'm right here.”

Shining recoiled as he turned his head, only to find a pony he thought that he and his wife had destroyed.

“S-Sombra!” He yelped.

“That's KING Sombra to you!” An enraged look came over the very much alive tyrant's face. “After you and that pathetic little wench of yours took my kingdom away from me you owe me at least that much!”

“No! I'll never refer to you as k-king!” Shining whispered, but began to feel as if something inside him was trying to break loose, something that wanted to call Sombra his king.

“We'll see about that...once I make the corruption in your blood resurface.” Sombra smirked as his horn began to brim with power.

Suddenly, the slight feeling that Shining had within him began to spread, and strengthen, he wanted to grovel at Sombra's hooves and serve him for the rest of his days. A small part of him tried to resist, but it was no use, he was no match for Sombra, especially in his current state.

Sombra cackled as he saw the results of the corruption begin to show. Shining's fur and mane darkened a few shades, his horn once again became infested with dark crystals, and finally his eyes became filled with the same ethereal green glow, and brimmed with purple smoke just as Sombra's did.

“Now,” Sombra tried once more, “how do you address me?”

“You are my true master my king,” Shining declared without hesistation, “I live only to serve my master Sombra!”

“And what are your feelings towards that wife of yours?”

“None my liege.”

“Excellent...” Sombra smiled darkly as he knew his work was done. Now for the next step of the plan. “I believe you do owe me one thing my subject.”

“What is it my liege? State the request, and I will fill it!” Shining pleaded, eager to serve his new master.

“I need you to provide me an heir.”

“But my liege,” Shining interrupted with a confused look, “I already have many heirs for your empire growing within me!” Sombra grinned as he continued.

“Yes that may be so, but they are not of my blood quite yet.”

“What must I do to rectify this master?” Shining whimpered.

“You are a breeder correct?” Sombra hinted not so subtly, a lustful gaze in his eyes.

“Y-yes my liege!” Shining moaned as he knew what Sombra was getting at, and the heat in his loins was already gathering from the sheer anticipation of what was happening.

“Well then...” Sombra said huskily as his brought his muzzle to Shining's, “it's time for you to provide for your king.”

Shining was already raring to go as he engaged in a heavy make out session with what used to be his worst enemy. With the corruption already making Sombra the center of his world he was already ready for Sombra after only a minute or two.

“P-Please my king!” Shining moaned breathily. “I need it now!”

“As you wish...” Sombra agreed, figuring that the sooner he got to work the better, and as Shining was filled with the most mind blowing pleasure he'd ever had in his life, Sombra could only grin as he not only made Shining pregnant with his own foal, but corrupted all of the other foals that he'd been pregnant with with his essence.

After finishing, Shining held a pleased smile on his face as he fell asleep on the floor, while Sombra still stood, showing no signs of being tired as he teleported Shining back to the Crystal Empire while giving him control of his mind once again. After all, it would arouse suspicion if he had done otherwise, and for his plan to succeed, he needed to keep this little meeting as secret as possible until the foals had matured enough for them to feel his call.

Now...I wait He thought, a malevolent smile crossing his face.

The next morning...

Shining found that he couldn't suppress the smile that was worming its way onto his face as his eyes saw Flash Sentry, his most recent lover, that he knew of, laying next to him with a contented smile on his face. The sight of the strong, handsome stallion seeming so satisfied sent a wide range of emotions through Shining's psyche. Joy, lust, satisfaction, all of these swept over the massively pregnant stallion as he sighed dreamily and lightly nuzzled his head into Flash's barrel, his head lodged under the other stallion's neck.

Speaking of his pregnancy, Shining wasn't surprised to find that he had grown again due to last night, however, what seemed strange was that his growth was a lot larger than the other times than it should have been it seemed. Rather than the seven or eight foals he had been expecting by this point, it seemed that from his amazingly oversized belly that he had to be pregnant with a litter of at least ten! Amazingly enough, his skin wasn't riddled with stretch marks that it should have been, rather it was simply the same smooth ivory color it had always been. He checked his teats, and was shocked to find that they hadn't been slacking off in the growth department any either. Calling them watermelons was somehow a bit of an understatement at this point, and it seemed that Shining was carrying a miniature pair of full term pregnant bellies underneath his primary one. Due to their sizes, they couldn't help but squish up against their neighboring properties, whether it was his hind legs or his actual belly.

Now if Shining could have actually gotten out of bed by this point he would probably question whether or not his hind legs were able to be crushed by the weight of his own butt, as his hips flared out drastically from his abdomen, giving him an insanely feminine and curvy figure. As if that wasn't enough, his flanks had gone from a supermodel's to something that belonged on a pony who was comparable to a Celestia who had been hitting the cake too much and had the calories go straight to her rear. The ridiculously plump balls of flesh had become so large that his cutie mark had almost practically tripled in size from the sheer size of his cheeks.

If Shining had any complaints with his immobility however, he didn't think about them. In fact, the afterglow he was feeling from the previous night was making him feel happier than he'd ever been before.

This brought one problem to the forefront of his mind however. One that had been gnawing at him ever since he'd gotten pregnant from Mr. Cake.

What would he do with Cadence?

It was bad enough that he'd already cheated on her multiple times with multiple stallions without her knowing, even worse that he'd slept with Flash on their bed in their private chambers, but he knew that worst of all was the fact that he didn't feel guilty about any of it. In fact, he somehow felt proud of the fact that he'd managed to father so many children in such a short time. It made him feel...sexy. Maybe even more so than his own wife!

The gravid prince shook his head. He had to focus on what to do! He had to at least figure out if he still felt anything for Cadence.

“Oh why can't this be easier?” He whimpered softly, not noticing that his voice had grown even more feminine than before. He looked up into the face of Flash Sentry, still fast asleep, and felt his frown disappear once again. He certainly knew now that his feelings for the stallion had turned into more than just simple lust or even a mere crush. As he looked up into the chiseled, blocked muzzle of the father of several of his children, he couldn't help but feel as though he wanted to remain in this bed, curled up with the orange pegasus for all eternity. Funnily enough these feelings sounded very similar to the feelings he'd had when Cadence had been with him only a few days ago.

So was this love? Shining was conflicted. He felt in his heart that he still loved his Princess Cadence, they had been through so much together, and he knew that wouldn't fade away from a few simple ruts with some stallions. However, at the same time, he felt true happiness whenever he thought about Flash, and his foals seemed to sense this as they had gone from thrashing about in his womb to gentle kicks here and there, and by now he knew it was official.

He had fallen in love with Flash Sentry.

However, he felt his smile fade away once he realized this as tears began to well in his eyes.

“But then...who do I choose?” Shining whispered to himself.

Suddenly, Shining felt the stallion above him begin to stir, and he knew he had to make a decision quick!

He decided to...

However, that still left the question of who to pick, and as Flash Sentry looked over at him with a warm smile on his face he knew that the time had come to speak up.

"Good morning sir!" He chirped, "I hope you had a good time last night! I kno- sir? Is something wrong?" Flash's grin faltered as he noticed his superior look as though he was about to cry.

"F-Flash..." the ivory unicorn whimpered.

"Sir...is...is everything alright?" He whispered, opting to wrap his hooves around his lover's neck in a comforting manner.

This is it... Shining told himself weakly, this is where I choose my path...

A long pause filled the room. Shining desperately trying to find the will to speak while Flash could only wait silently and contemplate what the other was about to say, though he had an idea about what it was. Shining's litter seemed to sense the tenseness of the situation and began kicking up a storm, only adding to the weight of the situation in Shining's mind as he instantly went to rub what he could of his belly to try and sooth his unborn. Flash seemed to realize that it was hard to manage the amount of belly that Shining carried on him (he was pregnant with roughly 10 foals after all) and took it upon himself to rub the rest of what he could of Shining's massive orb of life.

Finally Shining interrupted the silence and spoke once more, surprising them both.

"F-Flash..." he stuttered, his breath and voice obviously shaky due to what he was about to say.

15422111121121212222221221111.content:
"Y-Yes Captain?" Flash Sentry whispered, awaiting anxiously about what his commanding officer would reply with.

Shining Armor found himself hesitating one last time. He hadn't thought this far ahead to be honest, and he hadn't expected to find himself placed in his current situation either. However, as he thought it through one more time the choice of what he should do was made known to him. Taking a deep breath to steady his nerves, he spoke the words that would forever change his life.

"I-I love you... Flash Sentry," he breathed, turning to gaze at his lover with eyes that were flowing with tears, yet were firm in their resolve.

"Captain I-I," Flash was at a loss for words at this point, and he felt his face burning with embarrassment at the unicorn's confession. He knew that what he was doing was wrong, and a disservice not only to the empire, but to the princess as well, but if he had to be honest with himself he couldn't deny that he had developed very strong feelings for the pregnant stallion before him, which only seemed to intensify the more he looked upon the object of his affections.

"Flash?" Shining questioned fearfully, thinking that perhaps the pegasus hadn't returned his feelings after all.

"Captain," Flash started once again, this time with a confident smile, "I-I think that I love you as well."

To say that the pegasus stallion was surprised when Shining Armor practically leaped towards him after that was an understatement. Flash honestly hadn't expected his Captain to have this much agility with how pregnant he was, but then again stranger things had happened, and he shrugged it off as one passionate kiss melded into many, and soon things heated up more and more as they held nothing back this time, after all, they knew how they felt towards each other now.

It was only a few minutes until things turned even more intimate between the two, and after consummating their love once more, for real this time, the two fell back in a tired heap, Shining's head nestled cutely in Flash's barrel while the pegasus cradled his love protectively.

"That was the best round yet," Shining murmured through his exhaustion, "though I hope I'm not getting too big for you my love."

"Are you kidding?" Flash chuckled, "you're just full of life is all, nothing I can't handle, and besides," he leaned in towards Shining's ear and whispered, "your flank is to die for." He then gave Shining a playful smack on the rump to prove his point, and though it had merely been a light tap, Shining's plot was now so ridiculously round and plump with fat that it was jiggling heavily even at the small touch, the ripple of the flesh and skin almost hypnotic to the stallion.

"H-Hey!" Shining yelped, his voice cracking into an octave that shouldn't have been possible for any stallion, "it's not like I asked for these huge flanks!"

Despite the glare that Shining was currently giving to Flash, the alabaster unicorn couldn't fight the blush forming on his face, or suppress the feeling of happiness at the fact that his new love actually found his new body attractive, and before he realized what was going on he found himself engaging in another kiss with the pegasus guard. All was well between the two, and they were both happier than they'd ever been.

"SHINING?!?" A familiar voice shouting tore the two newly formed partners apart as they whipped their heads towards the door.

The voice belonged to none other than Princess Mi Amore Cadenza, who had a face that betrayed many emotions. Sadness, heartbreak, rage, confusion, and shock were all present on the pink alicorn's muzzle.

"Your majesty wai-" Flash tried to explain, but was teleported away before he could barely even form a sentence, leaving a very scared Shining Armor with his very disturbed now ex-wife. However, what was scaring him most was the fact that she wasn't saying anything rather simply pacing around, trying to form words, and failing. The only thing she muster up was a scrutinizing glare or a calculating look at his gravid form. Finally, she huffed and turned away from him completely.

"Caden-"

"One minute." She cut him off harshly, making him flinch in fear, "you have one minute to explain to me why my husband was cheating on me with one of our guards on our bed in our private chambers." Shining gulped. He knew now that he had no choice but to come clean about everything, and so he started to explain everything. He explained about how after finding out that she couldn't give birth to a foal he had gone to Zecora and drank the potion. He recounted about how he'd slept with Mr. Cake in a drunken one night stand, and had proceeded to have his way with quite a few other stallions after that while growing bigger and bigger with each passing one.

Finally, after he brought the tale to a close he took one last look at Cadence. The silence that came over them was almost deafening, and nobody spoke a single word.

After what seemed like days, the Princess of Love finally turned around towards him.

Shining's eyes widened, her face had a look of...

Shining cringed when he saw his former spouse turn around. Cadence's face bore an expression that practically radiated anger even from looking at it, and it was a look most unfitting for a mare who bore the title of "Princess of Love." Indeed Shining was not feeling very loved at all right now.

"Cadence please," he croaked fearfully, "I know you're mad-"

"Mad?" She snorted, before she laughed, a barking harsh cackle, "MAD?!? I'm not just mad Shining Armor. I'm absolutely livid."

"B-But..."

"Honestly what were you even thinking?!?" She screamed, not even letting the pregnant stallion utter two words, "I know I said I was sad about not being able to have a foal of our own, but how idiotic do you have to be to actually think that cheating on me was a good idea?!?"

"W-Well I-"

"We could have adopted Shining, we could have tried other methods for a foal, anything!" She ranted on, giving Shining a cold, hateful glare all the while, "Yet you went behind my back and committed adultery against the one pony who can literally feel when relationships change!"

"..." Shining didn't know how to respond. Throughout his career as a guard his training had beaten into him that he was always to face danger unflinchingly and stoically without showing fear. However, after getting pregnant it seemed like the hormonal surges he'd had were affecting that, and without Flash Sentry he could only whimper and cower helplessly as Cadence continued to assault him verbally. The worst part about all of this was that Cadence was right! His plan hadn't exactly accounted for her feelings, and he hadn't thought it through very well, and to top it all off he didn't even feel any guilt about cheating on her so many times, not even a slight bit, and this scared him.

"Nothing to say I see." Cadence growled, before a malevolent look crossed her muzzle, "well then, since you can't really go anywhere, I suppose we shall get to your... punishment."

Then, Shining could only watch in terror as the princess's horn began to glow. Except something was horribly wrong, Cadence's usual cyan aura on her horn was now a twisted black and purple that encased a dark green light within her horn. The magical aura seemed to absorb the color and light from everything around it, and Cadence seemed to have darkened a few shades as well. Finally, after charging up fully, a beam of magic shot towards the ivory unicorn and encased him, making him shut his eyes. Strangely enough, despite the malicious glow, the beam simply seemed to put a bit of pressure on him, before letting up altogether.

Cracking open one eye he found...

1542211112112121222222122111111.content:
At first he had noticed no change. Everything was still there and it seemed that the beam of dark magic hadn't even affected him. He opened his mouth to say a smart remark towards the spell's caster until something urgent drew his attention. It was a weird sensation coming from his hindquarters, like the feeling that something had popped within him and now said something was flowing in a steady stream down his legs.

"What did you do?" He squeaked.

"Oh Shiny," Cadence cooed mockingly, "surely you're not so dense that you can't tell when your water has broken?"

"But that means..." His eyes widened upon realizing what she'd done to him.

"Yes my little liar! Congratulations!" She snickered darkly, "you're about to give birth!"

"That doesn't seem like much of a punishment though..." He remarked, garnering an absolutely molten gaze from the alicorn across from him.

"Bearing foals is one of the most painful things a mare can go through Shining!" She snarled, before smiling eerily, "added to that fact, I have a little...discovery I mean to show you..."

"What kind of discovery?" Shining knew it wasn't a good thing most likely, but it's not as if he was in any condition to fight back.

"Well you see Shiny, while you were having the time of your life," she spat the words as if they were poison, "over here in Canterlot, I was studying with auntie Celestia and Luna, and I came across a few tricks that we unicorns can do concerning foal-bearing."

"..." Shining remained silent, sending futile hopes to Celestia that she didn't want to test said tricks on him.

"At a loss for words eh?" She grinned wickedly, "that's fine, I'll simply show you! But first..." Shining had no time to react as another beam of dark magic shot from Cadence's horn, though this time it hit his own horn, blocking his magic as he felt the dark crystals begin to grow on his horn once again. "There, now I won't have to worry about any tricks from you honey." She giggled with mock sweetness.

"Now that your water broke you should be having your first contraction in a few moments here..." she explained, and indeed as she finished her sentence Shining winced lightly as a mild discomfort bloomed within the lower region of his belly. Cadence took notice of this and smirked. "There we go, this brings me to my first trick..." she said as her horn glowed once again, and immediately Shining felt the discomfort return, though it was only a tiny bit stronger, "I can control the frequency of your contractions.

"Is that it?" Shining snorted through the discomfort, seeing as how he could handle it easily.

"Not by a longshot dear," Cadence shot back, "just for that little retort, I'll show you my second trick," her horn glowed once again, though this time it was quite a bit brighter in its intensity.

"Hmph," Shining grunted haughtily, feeling the discomfort bloom a third time, "if that's all you've got then- urgh!" he was suddenly stopped as the discomfort exploded into a pain unlike anything he'd ever felt before, making him clutch his belly in his hooves as he curled up in pain. "Ohhh CELESTIA," he screamed, "MAKE IT STOP!"

"Heehee, and there is my second trick!" Cadence announced with a cackle, "controlling the intensity of your contractions!"

"Y-You Ohhhhhh!" Shining couldn't help the tears rolling down his face at the unholy pain that roared throughout his nethers, and he found himself unable to speak due to sheer pain, which Cadence delighted in.

"You want to know the best part Shining?" She cooed almost happily, "I placed a sound barrier around this room, so no one can hear you, and I can control every aspect of your labor. I could make it last years if I was feeling...especially cruel, but luckily for you I'm feeling merciful, so I think that forty-eight hours of excruciating labor should pay me back for a broken heart don't you agree?" A hateful glare and a groan of pain was all she received, making her roll her eyes, "still not enough for you eh?" She mockingly asked before tapping a hoof to her chin in thought.

"I've got it!" She cried, before turning and smiling darkly at the former prince "since you proved that you obviously aren't responsible enough to take care of however many foals there are inside you now, I'll simply raise them myself." Seeing Shining's look of fear when she said that, she continued on, "and if you're thinking what I know you're thinking, then no, you won't be staying in this castle any longer after your treacherous behavior here. In fact, I know just how to fix this!" She lit her horn up another time, and fired once more at Shining Armor, who noticed that his fur was beginning to turn from his pure white coat to an ugly muddy brown.

After this Cadence brought a mirror over, which revealed that she'd changed his appearance with an illusion spell to that of an earth pony stallion with a plain unkempt white mane and a dirty earthen coat of fur who was also a bit on the small side. In fact, if one were to disregard the shape of his chest and his squared muzzle, he'd probably be mistaken for a mare!

"Fortunately for me I didn't have to bother with changing your voice since the hormones already seemed to take care of that..." Cadence pointed out, before chuckling, "and I've also done you a huge favor and made the seal on your horn permanent, this way nopony questions why an earth pony can use magic, or that you try to mess with the illusion." Trotting around his bed, she watched Shining writhe in pain, his foals kicking up a storm as they felt themselves being prepared for their grand entrance into the world. "Well Muddy Earth, now that my poor husband seems to have disappeared," she paused to giggle at her own jest, "it seems that I'll have to raise these poor foals as my own flesh and blood! And you," She said pointedly at Shining, "will never be a part of their lives again."

"You...witch..." Shining hissed angrily during a particularly painful contraction.

"Aw, I love you too Shiny," she cooed, before an evil look once again washed over her face, "now let's get to birthing shall we?"

The ward wasn't in the best shape, and Muddy was left alone most of the time, only being cared for by the now all female staff, they had learned their lesson with the male janitor, whenever he was too pregnant to move, or when it came time for him to birth his current batch of foals.

However, even though Muddy grew lazier and bigger than ever, and his own sister had come to see him, scrunching her nose in disgust without realizing it was her own brother, he was happy now that his life as a breeder was being taken care of all day everyday.

Then one day, the stallion heard a few of the mares chatting about something as they bathed him, his current litter of thirteen foals leaving him too heavy to bathe himself. He had always found it especially hard to pay attention to their prattle whenever the time came to scrub his teats, and despite having done this countless times before he never made an effort to stifle the loud moan of pleasure that erupted from his mouth every time they washed his massive mammaries. They paid no mind to this shameless display of ecstasy, having grown used to Muddy's ribald behavior, and continued talking about something that stirred up a feeling within Muddy Earth, one that he hadn't felt in a long time.

The mares were talking about reports of the Crystal Empire being under siege by Sombra once again, except, much to the horror of Princess Cadance, the young princes and princesses had defected and allied themselves with the dark crystal emperor. As Muddy heard this, he couldn't help but feel as though he was needed their desperately, not by Cadance of course, she had cut ties with him long ago, but by Sombra of all ponies, and as Muddy looked towards the window, he knew that all of the children he had fathered in Ponyville could feel it too. They could all feel the tug in their hearts that something big was looming on the horizon.

What was that something you might ask? It was simple really, and Muddy Earth couldn't help but smile at the thought.

The destruction of Equestria was at hand, and it would begin with the conquest of Ponyville, with Muddy Earth, and his many children, who even now could feel their father's rage beckoning them to join his quest of vengeance.

Ponyville didn't stand a chance as the children used their dark crystalline magic, cloaked by the night, to enslave all of Ponyville, with Muddy Earth waiting patiently for his master, and one true lover, Sombra to return once again...
1542211112112121222222122111111222111222.title: The Path of the Breeder: He gave in to his urges!

15422111121121212222221221111113.content:
Years later, Shining Armor, or Muddy Earth as he was now called, could still remember the two days of birth as vividly as ever, and after giving birth to eleven healthy foals he was promptly cast out of the Crystal Palace in an exhausted heap. The few crystal ponies and guards who had witnessed this made sure to spread the word of this mysterious stallion who was obviously trouble if he'd been cast out of the palace in such a manner.

Thus, ponies avoided Muddy Earth as much as they could, and if that wasn't enough, Cadence had cruelly left the other features of his immense pregnancy intact that made ponies shy away from him. That's right, wherever he walked his massive teats weighed down heavily on his rear end, dragging along the ground as the milk inside them sloshed to and fro. Muddy Earth had tried many times to milk them dry, but Cadence had made sure that they would forever remain on him, and so no matter how much he squeezed or prodded they would never shrink in size or run dry.

That wasn't even getting around to his flanks, which seemed to have somehow increased in size just a tad since the birth, which bounced and wobbled with every step he took. He could feel every ripple, every jiggle that the two gigantic round balls of flesh made whilst walking, and while a normal mare's cutie mark on their plot measured around two inches in diameter, his flanks were so massive, so large that his new cutie mark, the male and female insignia intertwined which was the symbol of a breeder, was stretched to a comical eight inches in diameter. This two pairs of assets were the subject of much ridicule from mares all over, and the reason that many stallions mockingly cat-called and whistled his was every time he passed them.

He didn't see much of his children, though he heard from ponies that they were at least doing well, which gave him some comfort. However, beyond the fact that they were about ten years old now he knew little else of them. Other than that Muddy Earth simply tried to get by one day at a time.

Then Sombra returned.

The Crystal Tyrant returned with little warning, catching everypony off guard with a swift and powerful assault using his vast array of dark crystals and magic he had at his disposal. The empire didn't stand a chance. Worst of all it was discovered that Sombra had corrupted the new prince and princesses somehow, and now they loyally served him, much to the horror of the princess and the royal guard.

Muddy Earth could only look on as the empire fell swiftly fell under Sombra's rule once again, with no hope of recovery as he made sure to lock the Crystal Heart away with no way to access it. He looked on in pure terror until suddenly he saw Sombra stop as if he sensed something, and Shining stood frozen as the tyrant turned and immediately looked at him. The evil king simply smirked and motioned for Muddy Earth to come towards him.

Muddy Earth didn't know why, but he suddenly found himself slowly walking towards Sombra, feeling as though he belonged at his side for some reason, though all logical thought screamed that this was a bad course of action.

Once he stood next to Sombra he suddenly began to recall everything that had happened between him and Sombra on that fateful night within the cavern, and the more he recalled the more his coat darkened, and the more the black mist filled his eyes with darkness. Seeing this, Sombra smiled an uncharacteristically warm smile and nuzzled him lightly.

"Welcome home...my queen." His voice rumbled regally, and Muddy Earth simply nuzzled back as he saw his foals flock to him, all smiling as well.

"Welcome home...mother." They all chorused, and for the first time in a decade Muddy Earth knew happiness once again.

From then on Sombra and his queen ruled over the empire with an iron hoof, making sure that nopony dared come near his empire once again, and though Sombra had already gained eleven foals from Muddy Earth, after taking over the empire they immediately began to fulfill Sombra's desires for an even greater empire. Muddy Earth had no qualms with being eternally pregnant either, sometimes being pregnant with almost fifteen foals at once! Luckily his teats, which thankfully didn't grow anymore, provided enough nourishment for each and every one of his foals, who all nuzzled up against his massive flanks for warmth whenever they felt cold. He was still a breeder after all, and as the litters that filled his womb came and went, he happily watched his children grow up into strong leaders of Sombra's army until eventually they were large enough to pose a threat to all of Equestria.

Sombra was out to conquer the world, and Muddy Earth, his queen and personal foal factory, happily followed.
15422111121121212222221221111113.title: Years later?

1542211112112121222222122111113.content:
Shining stared down at his hooves. The pearly white color of his fur had disappeared; Now, they were a dark, almost black shade of grey, as if he'd been stomping through a coal field. He watched in horror and confusion as the color crept up his legs and began to spread across his chest and bloated belly.

"C-Cadence?" He stammered, "What is-"

"My voice!" Shining gasped. His voice had grown deep and baritone, like the rumblings of a distant volcano.

"I've turned you into a perfect copy of King Sombra," Cadence responded, smiling vengefully at Shining's horrified expression, "You love gallivanting with my guards so much? Well, you'll have plenty of opportunity for that. You'll spend the rest of your life as a breeding bitch, as punishment for your 'crimes against the Crystal Empire'."

Shining opened his mouth to beg for mercy, but the low grumble of his voice made him choke. His eyes rolled up, watching as his horn warped and shifted into a red, pointed claw. In his panic, he focused his magic and began to chant the runes of a teleportation spell under his breath, but he couldn't feel the ley lines responding - Couldn't feel anything from his horn - As if that most important sensory organ had been simply switched off!

"Oh, you won't be doing magic anymore," Cadence giggled, "I couldn't just let a 'mad dictator' go around with the power to destroy worlds, now can I?"

"Y-you'll never get away with this," Shining, now Sombra, grumbled.

"Oh?" Cadence snorted, placing a hoof over his mouth to hold in her laughter, "And who exactly would listen to you? As far as anypony knows, you attacked my husband, and it was only through his brave sacrifice that you were subdued into this lowly form."

Sombra's eyes widened, and he sunk to the floor, choking back a sob as his labor contractions came back.

"Have a fun life," Cadence sing-songed, opening the door and stepping outside.

"Oh, guards?" She called, "It's time to punish the 'prisoner'."

Applebuck had come for one reason: the hope the potion would give him his cutie mark. He felt that this was it. Dusk wasn't sure, he wanted the colt to get his mark, but wasn't sure if this was it.
"Well...ok, but-"
Dusk didn't finish his sentence, Applebuck grabbed the potion and chugged it down. He looked at his stomach. Nothing changed.
"Aw pony feathers..."
"The effects don't show till later Applebuck, I'm-"
At that moment, Applebuck's eyes glowed white for a few seconds, then they went back to normal.
"Wow....that was cool!"
Applebuck looked at the clock.
"Land sakes! Suppers waitin' at home! By mister Dusk!"
Applebuck took off headed for home.

155332222111212.title: He found it

1553322221112121.content:
Applebuck looked at a potion he was was making. He had got some basic items from his dear friend Dusk Shine. He hope that this would be his calling, his talent. The yellow colt looked at the blue liquid. He was positive that when he added the crushed Poison Joke in, he would get his cutie mark. He measured 1/2 a cup of it, and poured it in.

"BOOM!"

A large cloud of lavender enveloped the colt for a few minutes. Soon he saw the potion turn to black.
"Hope aw did it right."
He look at his flank, nothing.
"Aw pony feathers..."
He was still a blank flank. However, what did he make? He looked at it, he was sure that it was fresh. It wasn't bad looking at all. Then he heard his stomach growl at him. He was hungry, he knew he shouldn't have skipped lunch.
"Well aw guess aw could try it."
He held it in his hooves gently.
And gulped it down. Then after he did...

1553322221112122.content:
Applebuck was trotting home from the Evergreen forest. He had just got a potion from Zicoro. He had found it was a pregnancy potion for making a mare pregnant. He had just given it to Applebuck as a gift as their friendship. Applebuck was thinking how kind the native shaman had been, and that he'd have to repay him. When he began to wonder if it work on a male and that he should try the potion. He looked at it and shrugged.

"Better safe then sorry."

He opened the top and gulped it down. Just as he finished it...

15533222211122.content:
Applebuck was helping his big brother Applejack around the farm as usual.
"Man big brother! All that workin really made me hungrier than a parasprit!"
"Well, why don't ya eat an apple or two ta calm ya down."
He zoomed to nearest tree and tried to reach for an apple. However, due to his small height, he couldn't reach one. Applejack chuckled heartily as he watched him try. Finally, he went over a picked one off.
"Here ya go."
"Thanks AJ!"
He ate the apple like it was his last meal.
"Well, that was great! Anything else ya need help with?"
"Naw, we did everything. Now let's go home."
They headed home, however, on the way home, Applebuck felt his stomach hurt.
"Agh....oh, big brother....I don't feel good."
AJ looked at his brother. He did look pretty tired and a little sick.
"Why don't ya head to bed?"
"Oh thanks big bro..."
Applebuck headed to his room, and layed in his bed. The next morning, before any other pony was awake, he feel weird. He looked at his stomach and saw...
